nodes.text: A species of furry anthropoids was native to Garqi, an agriworld in the Cassander sector. In 25 ABY, when the Jedi Knight Corran Horn led a team of his fellow Jedi to Garqi to investigate the Yuuzhan Vong presence on the planet, several of these anthropoids were frightened by his starship as it traversed a purple forest. The creatures scurried away from its approach.
Author Michael Stackpole created this species for his novel, The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide II: Ruin, published by Del Rey in 2000. In reality, anthropoids are a subgroup of primates.
